author: dawid_sz
content: Thanks. I see Nimbus uses `bitcoin-core/secp256k1` same as Nethermind (via C# wrapper), so I'll try it instead of Zig's standard library and see if I get the same signature

author: dawid_sz
content: Okay, using `bitcoin-core/secp256k1` (through Zig wrapper `zig-eth-secp256k1`) fixed the problem, I now get the same signature as the one listed in ENR test vector. Thank you so much <@902806914252021830>, <@301186049323958275>, <@364458974906548225>  and <@240180844130598912> for your help and suggestions
